question.title: how do I get the instance of sun.misc.Unsafe

node.contents: how do I get the instance of the unsafe class? I always get the security exception. I listed the code of the OpenJdk6 implementation. I would like to mess around with the function sun.misc.Unsafe offers to me, but I always end up getting the SecurityException Unsafe.

astNode.text: how do I get the instance of the unsafe class? I always get the security exception. I listed the code of the OpenJdk6 implementation. I would like to mess around with the function sun.misc.Unsafe offers to me, but I always end up getting the SecurityException Unsafe.

elements.contents: public static Unsafe getUnsafe() { Class cc = sun.reflect.Reflection.getCallerClass(2); if (cc.getClassLoader() != null) throw new SecurityException("Unsafe"); return theUnsafe; }

units.rawText: public static Unsafe getUnsafe() { Class cc = sun.reflect.Reflection.getCallerClass(2); if (cc.getClassLoader() != null) throw new SecurityException("Unsafe"); return theUnsafe; }

node.contents: please don't try to tell me how unsafe it is to use this class.

astNode.text: please don't try to tell me how unsafe it is to use this class.

node.contents: This should give you instance of Unsafe:

astNode.text: This should give you instance of Unsafe:

elements.contents: @SuppressWarnings("restriction") private static Unsafe getUnsafe() { try { Field singleoneInstanceField = Unsafe.class.getDeclaredField("theUnsafe"); singleoneInstanceField.setAccessible(true); return (Unsafe) singleoneInstanceField.get(null); } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (SecurityException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (IllegalAccessException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } }

units.rawText: @SuppressWarnings("restriction") private static Unsafe getUnsafe() { try { Field singleoneInstanceField = Unsafe.class.getDeclaredField("theUnsafe"); singleoneInstanceField.setAccessible(true); return (Unsafe) singleoneInstanceField.get(null); } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (SecurityException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } catch (IllegalAccessException e) { throw createExceptionForObtainingUnsafe(e); } }
